tool_description: Reconciles payment transactions with settlement reports from gateways and identifies discrepancies in amounts, fees, and timing.

settlement_file_path.description: Path to gateway settlement file (if available)

error_messages: Settlement file not found: Specified settlement file path does not exist
Invalid date format: Settlement date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
No transactions found: No transactions found for specified date and gateway
Gateway data unavailable: Unable to retrieve settlement data from gateway
Merchant mismatch: Merchant ID does not match settlement data
usage: Provide settlement_date, gateway_name, and merchant_id for reconciliation. Optionally include settlement_file_path and adjust tolerance_amount for variance acceptance.

calculated_settlement.description: Expected settlement amount based on transactions
